name: Tiny House Simulator
storyline: You are a business owner who builds and delivers Tiny Houses to customers. Your main goal is to grow your business and satisfy customers. You may upgrade your car or attend to the events all around the map.
summary: Manage your own tiny house building company in this open-world adventure. Create unique homes for clients, discover varied landscapes, and deliver your creations across the island. Upgrade your business, navigate picturesque routes, and immerse yourself in beautiful scenery.
